experiment_info.name: multi_restart_nm_polish
experiment_info.description: Run NM polish multiple times from slightly perturbed starting points
experiment_info.hypothesis: NM may converge to different local minima from different starting points. Running 3 NM polishes from perturbed positions may find better final solution.

tuning_runs.note: Projected over 60 min budget, reduced restarts
Still over budget and worse score than baseline

final_result.reason: Over budget (66.2 min > 60 min) and worse score (1.1524 < 1.1688)
